metadata.title: Lisbon Travel Guides 2026 by Locals | Verified Itineraries & Routes
metadata.description: Complete Lisbon guides with detailed itineraries, exact schedules, GPS and maps. Created by locals. What to see in Lisbon, Alfama, Belem, viewpoints and authentic restaurants. Updated 2026.
metadata.ogTitle: Lisbon Travel Guides 2026 by Locals - Verified Itineraries
metadata.ogDescription: Itineraries with exact schedules, GPS and local restaurants. What to see in Lisbon, Alfama, Belem. No tourist traps.

home.heading: The Lisbon that
home.subheading: Three years here taught me the difference between visiting and living: the cafes in Graca where you still have breakfast in silence, the neighborhoods no influencer photographs, and why Tram 28 is the perfect tourist trap.
home.tagline: This isn't a guide. It's my Lisbon.
home.routesDescription: Detailed hour-by-hour itineraries, restaurants that actually work, the best photo spots and offline maps that never fail.
home.whyDescription: I'm not a tourist who comes for two weeks and writes a guide. I've lived here for 3 years. I shop at the same supermarket, drink coffee at the same places and know the shortcuts that locals use every day.
home.whyLocal: Made by someone who lives here
home.whyLocalDesc: I don't write from a hotel. I've lived in Lisbon for 3 years. I know where to have a quiet breakfast in Graca before everyone arrives, which viewpoint works at 9am and why some restaurants close at 3pm.
home.whyUpdatedDesc: I update every guide monthly. If a restaurant changes hours, if a new viewpoint opens or a bar closes, I reflect it immediately. You won't arrive somewhere and find it closed 6 months ago.
home.whyGuaranteeDesc: If in the first 48 hours you decide the guide isn't worth what you paid, I'll refund 100% of your money. But here's a secret: most travelers tell me they save at least double the guide price on their first day by avoiding common mistakes.
home.freeDescription: Download my free essential guide: how public transport works, how much eating really costs, what to pack and the most common mistakes tourists make.
